code: import{createStore,combineReducers,applyMiddleware,compose}from'redux';import thunk from'redux-thunk';import bucket from'./modules/bucket';var middlewares=[thunk];var enhancer=applyMiddleware.apply(void 0,middlewares);var rootReducer=combineReducers({bucket:bucket});var store=createStore(rootReducer,enhancer);export default store;
